resources.string: Saudi Aramco is the world\'s largest oil producer. Officially known as Saudi Arabian Oil Company, the company is primarily state-owned and is based in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. It is the world\'s most profitable company, eclipsing even tech giants such as Apple (AAPL) and Alphabet\'s Google (GOOGL).

Work environment in the refinery is akin to human relations in that you share your expertise and training nationals. Professional people. Salary competitive. Working with diverse people. Meet a lot of professionals with different fields of expertise.

The Saudi Data and AI Authority (SDAIA) is a government agency in Saudi Arabia that was established by a royal decree. The authority has three other bodies linked to it. Two of which were also created by a royal decree on the same day. These two bodies are a center called "The National Centre for Artificial Intelligence" and an office called "The National Data Management Office. The third is the National Information Center, which is an existing entity.

Because it is a distinguished organization in the field of software engineering and artificial intelligence, it will provide me with good experience. In addition to the stimulating work environment and the formation of a network of relationships
